title: isnt urf supposed to be fun?
body: man, I thought urf was supposed to be a fun, lighthearted gamemode but instead people decided to make a meta for urf and its either "i get to play the one shot champ or i int/dodge." I also love how the winner is decided in champ select. Get a few cool champs? that's nice, have fun against {{champion:350}} , {{champion:24}} , {{champion:120}} , {{champion:11}} , and {{champion:45}}  who built tank because he already has 6000 ap off of spamming his cage and Q
